system.description:
You utter a divine censure, blinding or deafening one creature you can see in range. The creature has disadvantage on tasks requiring the lost sense.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.spell-effects.SOkcvkzrGMGQKhmk]{Spell Effect: Blind}

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.spell-effects.aAdqy5QwVJrT8JWE]{Spell Effect: Deaf}
